column4: when I click on a link in Thunderbird, Firefox does not open, why?
when I click on a link in Thunderbird, Firefox does not open, why?

sudo update-alternatives --all  and make sure you choose what apps you want as default  one of them is x-www-browser or something like that that one is for what you want but i would config all of them
inscape is not in a repo that i know of (atleast that version) as for amarok you need to add the amarok repo to your sources.list file to get 1.4.1
